alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 27 at 6:14AM MDT until March 27 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, except 4 to 8 inches in David County with up to 10 inches along the Davis County benches. * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected through the morning commute, particularly for Davis and Salt Lake Counties.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley
